title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Acclaimed playwright Tom Stoppard dies at 88
items.description: Tom Stoppard is remembered as a playwright whose wit and curiosity reshaped modern theater.

items.title: Ukraine hits tankers in Black Sea in escalation against Russia
items.description: The two ships stuck by drones were thought to be used to bypass Western sanctions on Russia.

items.title: U.S. airlines report short-term disruptions amid Airbus software issue
items.description: Airbus recommended an emergency software update to the A320 family of aircraft.

items.title: The Wiggles issue statement after appearing in Ecstasy music video
items.description: The popular Australian children's group says it "does not condone" drug use, after two of its members are shown dancing in a Keli Holiday video.

items.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

items.title: Venezuela calls Trump airspace closure warning 'colonialist threat'
items.description: US President Donald Trump said the airspace around Venezuela should be considered closed "in its entirety".

items.title: Trump to pardon ex-Honduras president convicted of drug trafficking
items.description: Juan Orlando Hernández was sentenced in the US to 45 years behind bars for conspiring to smuggle cocaine.
